Christ For Life Motercycle Ministry

Since 2005

"For the message of the Cross is foolishness to those who are perishing, but to us who are being saved it is the power of God."

1 Corinthians 1:18

Our Mission

Christ for Life motorcycle club exists with the purpose of reaching the motorcycle community with the saving knowledge and love of Jesus Christ.
